Really like the items at BJ's. I also have a Costco membership. They both have very different offerings from one another. I like BJs deli counter and bakery. The cons when comparing them to Costco- not as clean and bright. The BJs employees don't seem to have the enthusiasm that the Costco employees do. BJs is more like a warehouse atmosphere. I think the electronics and home goods are much more upscale at Costco.

Was looking for truvia sweetener in larger container, Agave nectar , compactor trash bags , none in inventory. This groupon was a great deal but would I continue with a membership , no
name: Lisa
